pages.text: The $(mob)Bighorn Sheep$() is a variant of the $(l:minecraft_sheep)$(mob)Sheep$() found in the $(thing)Twilight Forest$(). It comes naturally in different colors and has decorative horns, but is otherwise identical to mundane $(l:minecraft_sheep)$(mob)Sheeps$().$(p)It can only breed with other $(mob)Bighorn Sheeps$().
